headline: Verizon Communications (VZ) Increases Quarterly Dividend To US$0.69 Per Share
summary: Verizon Communications (VZ) announced a dividend increase on September 5, 2025, to 69 cents per share, enhancing shareholder value. During August, Jennifer K. Mann joined the Board, bringing extensive experience from her tenure at Coca-Cola. The company also launched preorders for the Google Pixel 10 series, offering competitive trade-in discounts and payment plans. These initiatives occurred as markets remained stable, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq posting modest weekly gains and Treasury...

summary: Discover why Verizon is the standout Dow Dog for dividends and potential 19%+ returns.
